CustomField.description:
External application system unique ID. Example uses: Common App, Nursing CAS, ELS.
DO NOT DELETE this field. DO NOT REMOVE its "external ID" setting. DO NOT REMOVE its "unique case-insensitive" constraint. All of these requirements are essential to avoid breaking data-loads from CommonApp into Salesforce via Jitterbit. Thank you!
CustomField.inlineHelpText: External application system unique ID. Example: Common App, Nursing CAS, ELS
CustomField.label: External Application ID
